record.darwin:Remarks: The fin clips are from specimens that were Pit tagged and released. The corresponding Pit tag numbers are: 0A00072370, male, 361 mm SL, 432 mm TL, 850 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00074377, male, 363 mm SL, 434 mm TL, 690 g, tubercles, ripe and running, cornified scales present; 0A00074517, male, 332 mm SL, 392 mm TL, 690 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00074609, male, 356 mm SL, 423 mm TL, 840 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00075847, female, 388 mm SL, 457 mm TL, 870 g, tubercles, ripe and running, loss of mucus, conrnified scales; 0A00076176, female, 402 mm SL, 468 mm TL, 960 g, loss of mucus, appeared spent; 0A00077417, male, 363 mm SL, 434 mm TL, 740 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00080257, male, 398 mm SL, 474 mm TL, 920 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00080718, male, 379 mm SL, 448 mm TL, 860 g, tuberclese, ripe and running; 0A00084553, female, 361 mm SL, 437 mm TL, 750 g, partial loss of mucus. The dry specimens are scales and both the scales and the fin clips are separated within the bag/jar by their ID numbers which are the last 5 digits of the Pit tag number.
